Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery transport amphora; exterior: red-fired band on rounded lip; below, black circle.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by the Museum of Classical Archaeology, Cambridge. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
For a discussion of the type, see Lambrino, 'Vases Archaiques d'Histria', p.107-115, fig.71; Birzescu, Histria XV, 69-74, type II,2; note two colours of paint
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2231)
